example.text: Only text field is required. Scale is 1 by default. Any {0}s will be replaced by a value. Comma placement is important.

translated_by.text: Translated by: Your Name here (or remove/blank this line to not show)

share_paste.text: Paste your share code / url here

filtermode_description.text: This is Item Filter Selection Mode. You can select items using tabs to the left, preview how the filtered items look to others with the preview button, and share your filtered items using the code in the input box below (paste in share code box).

user_lookup_details.text:
Any in-game changes take awhile to show up.
Results may be a few hours old.

outfit_manager_help.text: Here you can save your current outfit for later use! In case you want to backup, share, or transfer your list of outfits, you can also export/import outfits using the buttons on the top right.

tip_worn_items.text: Tip: Double clicking the outfit on the left will open a tab showing all the current worn items.

tip_save_scale.text: Tip: When you save the picture of your outfit, its image size matches the scale you currently have it at in this app.

tip_arrow_keys.text: Tip: It is possible to traverse item grids using keyboard arrow keys. Arrow keys work on the color picker too, letting you change the selected color input.
